translation.ko: 한번은 누굴 머리로 들이받아서 혼수상태로 만들었어

translation.en: Yeah. I know. I hit him so hard, he lost his ability to blink.
translation.ko: 네, 너무 세게 받아서 눈도 못 깜빡거리게 만들었죠

translation.en: Anyway, it was so nice to meet you. So, we're go--
What about you? How do you know the Maharajah?
Well, after I retired from football,
his father made me the chairman of the board of directors
translation.ko: 마하라자의 부친이 날 이사회 의장직에 앉혔어요

translation.en: of Shiz-Vik, his company.
Also, I helped him land that beautiful bride of his, the blonde. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 마하라자가 그 금발 미녀를 얻을 수 있게 돕기도 했고요

translation.en: Although she has nothing on this one. My God.
-Okay. -Okay.
I'll see you in a second.
$10,000, you can have one night with her.
translation.ko: 1만 달러만 주면 내 아내랑 밤을 보내게 해 주죠

translation.en: I'm kidding, you sick bastard.
[woman] That's quite the plate.
Do they not have food where you come from?
translation.ko: 당신 사는 곳엔 음식이 없나 봐요?

translation.en: No, you know, I just… I'm so used to my husband just eating off my plate,
translation.ko: 아뇨, 남편이 내 접시에 손대는 게 너무 익숙해져서

translation.en: so it's sort of become a habit.
But, no, you're absolutely right. I don't need this.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 그쪽 말이 맞아요 이것까진 필요 없겠어요

translation.en: No, no, no! Don't put it back.
-I was not gonna do that. -[woman scoffs]
Americans.
Would you care for one?
Oh, I'm so good. Thank you. Maybe another time.
-[Audrey] So, um… -Thank you. Are you on the bride's side?
No, I'm Saira, groom's sister.
I did not know Vik had a sister.
Yeah. [chuckles]
-These are very low tables! -[chuckles]
Are you reading 'cause you don't like weddings like this, or…
translation.ko: 이런 결혼식을 싫어해서 책을 읽는 거예요? 아님…

translation.en: No, you know, it's more that I don't like people.
I mean, these people in particular.
I guess as long as Claudette and your brother have fun,
that's all that matters.
Right. I don't really understand how anyone gets married.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 난 사람들이 왜 결혼을 하는지 모르겠어요

translation.en: Spending so much time with one person. Can you imagine?
translation.ko: 한 사람과 그 오랜 시간을 보낸다는 게 상상이 돼요?

translation.en: Well, speaking of my one person,
there he is.
Nick, this is Saira.
This is Vik's sister.
-Would you… -[Saira] No.
-You good? -[Audrey] She's good.
-I am Nick. Nice to meet you. -Saira.
Love your brother, by the way. -He's hysterical. -[Saira] Right.
translation.ko: 당신 오빠는 최고예요 너무 웃긴 친구죠

translation.en: Oh boy.
Okay, if you're trying to seduce me, it's really not working.
translation.ko: 혹시 날 꼬드기려는 거라면 전혀 효과 없어

translation.en: Oh my God.
Hey, Nick. I was just thinking about your lovely wife.
translation.ko: 여기 있군요, 닉! 마침 당신의 사랑스러운 아내를 생각하고 있었어요

translation.en: Oh, you again.
I see you've already met Francisco.
And I guess you're both acquainted with Vikram's harpy of a sister.
translation.ko: 비크람의 성질 고약한 동생을 만난 모양이군요

translation.en: -Did he say "herpe"? -Harpy.
Countess! How humiliating it must be for you to see Claudette
actually close a deal with the Maharajah.
Ever wonder what you might have done wrong, dear?
translation.ko: 당신이 뭘 잘못했는지 궁금했던 적 없어요?

translation.en: Ever wonder what it feels like to be tall enough to ride a rollercoaster?
translation.ko: 롤러코스터를 탈 만큼 키가 큰 게 어떤 기분인지 궁금한 적 없어요?

translation.en: That's Countess Sekou.
She's Vik's ex-fiancée, and she's Claudette's old university roommate.
translation.ko: 비크의 전 약혼녀이자 클로뎃의 대학 시절 룸메이트죠

translation.en: And they're still friends? She's quite rude, by the way.
translation.ko: 근데 아직도 친구예요? 진짜 무례한 여자더라

translation.en: Well, on top of all that, she's also Claudette's maid of honor.
-[Audrey] What? -Yeah.
[man over PA] Hope you watched the video because the dancing is about to begin!
translation.ko: 다들 영상은 보셨겠죠? 곧 춤이 시작됩니다!

translation.en: -What dancing? -I'm gonna fake going to the bathroom.
translation.ko: - 무슨 춤요? - 난 화장실 가는 척할 거야

translation.en: -I don't dance. You dance. -I didn't get a video. Did you?
translation.ko: - 난 안 해, 당신이 춰 - 당신 영상 받았어?

translation.en: They brought one to the room.
translation.ko: 하나 받긴 했는데 말하는 걸 깜빡했어

translation.en: -I forgot to tell you. -Thanks.
translation.ko: 하나 받긴 했는데 말하는 걸 깜빡했어 - 고맙네 - 사랑해

translation.en: [man over PA] Ladies and gentlemen, please help me welcome the bride!
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 신부를 환영해 주십시오!

translation.en: Come with us!
All right, come on!
-Come on, baby! -[screams]
[over PA] And now it's time!
The moment you've all been waiting for.
The groom, Vikram Govindan!
This is crazy!
Brother!
Back! Get everybody back! Get everybody back!
[guard] Stay back!
Vik!
-[Nick] Okay, all right. -[Claudette shrieks]
[Claudette] Is he dead?
It's not him. It's not Vik.
Oh, thank God! It's only Mr. Lou.
-Who did this to you? -[Claudette] Where is Vik? Hey!
translation.ko: - 누가 이랬어요? - 비크는 어디 있죠? 이봐요! 누구 짓이에요? 맙소사!

translation.en: [Audrey] Who? What? Oh my gosh!
Where is Vik?
-Who did this to you? -Who was it? Do you remember?
It was…
[Nick] Say it. Say it. Don't die. Don't die!
-[Audrey] Oh my gosh! -[Claudette] Where is Vik?
[guard 1] Clear! Clear! Come on!
-Come on! Come on! Come on! Go! -[guard 2] Clear!
-[Nick] This is a distraction. -[Audrey] From what?
translation.ko: 이걸로 주의를 끈 거야 - 뭘 하려고? - 도망치려고!

translation.en: From the escape!
-[Colonel] Are you serious? -[shutter clicks]
What do you mean all communication systems are down?
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 통신 시스템이 전부 먹통이라니?

translation.en: Get them up and running!
We have a security officer compromised. We need medical attention immediately.
[sighs] Okay.
[Vik] Help!
Yo, you hatin’ hard on me right now, son!
-Homeboy! -[Vik] Nick!
[Vik yelling] Nick!
This is some janky-ass shit!
[Colonel] Lock down the island
until the security cameras are back online.
All guests are to remain in their rooms.
translation.ko: 손님들은 모두 자기 방에 있게 하고

translation.en: Oh my God. We need to get ahead of this, or our shares will plummet.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 이대로 있으면 우리 주식이 폭락할 텐데

translation.en: My brother could be dead and the only thing you're concerned about are share prices?
translation.ko: 오빠가 죽게 생겼는데 당신은 주식 걱정이에요?

translation.en: How do you think our investors will react when news of this gets out,
translation.ko: 이 일이 알려지면 우리 투자자들이 어떻게 나올지 알긴 해?

translation.en: you little Miss Minority Shareholder?
Giving all her money to save the whales and heal the planet
translation.ko: 가진 돈을 죄다 고래랑 지구 보호니 뭐니

translation.en: and all that nonsense.
Colonel. Where is Vik?
Where is my husband?
[Colonel] We will find him. We will find him.
The Maharajah's been kidnapped.
-What? -[Countess] Oh my God!
-Where did they take him? -[Nick] He's alive.
Somebody with a machine gun threw him on a boat, and they took off.
translation.ko: 기관총을 든 사람이 비크를 강제로 배에 태워 떠났어요

translation.en: -How many kidnappers? -[Nick] One.
Which means his partner is still here on the island.
translation.ko: 즉, 놈의 공범은 아직 이 섬에 있단 거죠

translation.en: Hold on. How do you know there were two?
If the kidnapper had Vik and was taking him to the boat…
Ah, someone else was leading the elephant into the tent.
-Thank you. -There are 400 people on this island.
That's a lot of suspects.
Let us narrow it down for you, okay, Colonel?
Claudette, how many people knew about the elephant being part of the ceremony?
translation.ko: 클로뎃, 코끼리가 등장하는 걸 몇 명이나 알고 있었죠?

translation.en: Just the board.
Yeah, we had to sign off at the expense of transporting an elephant.
translation.ko: 그래요, 코끼리 수송 비용을 승인해야 했거든요

translation.en: So that means all of you.
What are you implying?
I think it's very obvious what I'm implying.
translation.ko: 그게 무슨 뜻인지는 분명한 것 같은데요

translation.en: -[Nick] Mm-hmm. -One of you is an accomplice to a murder.
translation.ko: 여러분 중 한 명이 살인 사건의 공범이란 거죠

translation.en: -That is ridiculous! -I'm not on the board!
translation.ko: - 말도 안 돼요! - 난 이사회가 아니네!

translation.en: Is it? You all hated my brother!
What? No, I… I love Vik.
[scoffs] Oh, please!
-You've never forgiven me. -For what?
translation.ko: - 날 아직도 용서 못 했구나? - 뭘 용서해?

translation.en: -Breaking up your engagement. -Oh, get over yourself.
translation.ko: - 네 약혼을 깬 거 - 정신 좀 차려

translation.en: It was an arranged marriage between our families.
We amicably split in order to allow for your so-called "love marriage."
translation.ko: 우린 원만하게 갈라섰어 네가 말하는 '연애결혼'을 위해

translation.en: You didn't want this marriage to go through so you kidnapped him!
translation.ko: 이 결혼식을 막으려고 비크를 납치한 거잖아!

translation.en: You gold-digging--
-Ladies, stop it! -Calm down, everybody!
translation.ko: - 꽃뱀 주제에… - 다들 그만해요! 다들 진정해요!

translation.en: -We do this for a living. It's what we do. -[Nick] It's our thing.
translation.ko: - 이런 게 우리 일이에요 - 우리가 전문이죠

translation.en: -And this is not just another case. -No.
-[Nick] This is personal. -[Audrey] Yeah, it's Vik.
-[Nick] He means a lot to us. -[Audrey] So we'll find out who did this.
translation.ko: - 우리한테 소중한 친구예요 - 우리가 범인을 알아낼 겁니다

translation.en: -[Nick] A hundred percent. -[Audrey] And find out why they did this.
And we're gonna get Vik back, okay?
We're gonna do this for the low, low price of $25 million.
translation.ko: 아주 싼값인 2,500만 달러에 이 사건을 맡도록 하죠

translation.en: Twenty-five mil, honey. I swear to God.
[Nick] I would've settled for ten grand. So insane.
translation.ko: - 난 1만 달러도 만족했을 텐데 - 단단히 미쳤어

translation.en: What are you doing?
[Nick] I'm blocking the door so no one can get in.
translation.ko: 아무도 못 들어오게 문을 막는 거야

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you're gonna hurt your back.
You know what would hurt my back? A knife going through it.
The killer knows we're on to him.
translation.ko: 범인은 우리가 자기를 알아낼 걸 알아

translation.en: We're on the next-to-kill list. I guarantee it.
translation.ko: 이제 우리를 죽이려고 들 거야 장담해

translation.en: What happened to Vik? A guy that rich gets kidnapped for the money.
translation.ko: - 비크는 어떻게 됐어? - 돈 때문에 부자를 납치했으니

translation.en: There's no profit in hurting him.
Oh God. We're not gonna be invited anywhere ever again. Ever again.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 우린 앞으로 어디에도 초대받지 못할 거야

translation.en: The cheese has a hold on me, honey. I can't stop.
translation.ko: 치즈가 나한테 요술을 부렸나 멈출 수가 없군

translation.en: Are you just… Will you take a slice like a civilized person?
translation.ko: 그걸 통째로… 문명인이면 잘라서 먹든가 해

translation.en: I don't know where the knife is.
-Oh Jesus! -[Nick] What? You got a headache?
translation.ko: - 칼이 어디 있는지 모르겠어 - 맙소사 왜? 머리 아파?

translation.en: -Yes! -[Nick] I'm sorry.
-How's your back? -My back's killing me.
-I'll get Advil. -Please. Please.
-I'm gonna get more cheese in me. -Honey, do not eat all that cheese.
translation.ko: - 난 치즈 먹고 있을게 - 그거 다 먹지 마

translation.en: That affects… You're terrible all night.
-Absolutely. -Oh.
And I have pictures from the tent of a burned robe with bloodstains.
translation.ko: 그리고 아까 텐트에서 사진 찍었어 핏자국이 묻은 옷이 불에 타고 있더라

translation.en: Someone was trying to get rid of the evidence,
and I'm sure it was the elephant handler.
Good detecting, sweetheart.
-I'm doing my best. Here. -[Nick] Okay. Thank you.
-[Audrey] One, two, three, four. -[Nick] Okay.
[Nick] I gotta move this stuff now?
What if that's the killer?
-Killers don't knock. -What if it's housekeeping?
translation.ko: - 살인범은 노크 안 해 - 객실 정비인가?

translation.en: We… We're good! We don't need any towels.
No! No! We do need towels. Leave 'em out front, please!
translation.ko: 아뇨, 수건 필요해요 앞에 두고 가요

translation.en: We've been here ten minutes. You need more towels?
You use 30 towels after every shower.
I'm sorry. At least I shower.
All right, you got me there.
[Francisco] It's me, Francisco!
Francisco?
Wait, wait, wait. What if he's the killer?
The only thing he wants to murder is your hm-hm!
translation.ko: 저 인간이 끝장내고 싶은 건 당신 거기뿐이야!

translation.en: Hey!
-[Francisco] Hurry! There's no time! -[Nick] Be right there!
-[Audrey] We're hurrying! -[Nick] We know!
So sorry.
-[Nick] Hey. -Hey.
-You. -[Nick] Mm-hmm.
Gorgeous.
[Nick] Jesus Christ. All right.
[Audrey] Put this back. You said hurry. What's… How can we help?
-I have information. -[Nick] Yes.
Everyone thinks Claudette is this gold digger,
but what's not so well known is the fact that, as a precaution,
the board made her sign a brutal prenup.
translation.ko: 이사회가 클로뎃한테 혼전 계약서를 쓰게 했어요

translation.en: So that means if Vik divorces her, she's left with nothin'.
translation.ko: 그럼 비크가 이혼하면 클로뎃은 한 푼도 못 받는군요

translation.en: -I gotta move this shit again? -Wait. Wait. Who is it?
[Claudette] It's Claudette. You must hear what I have to say.
translation.ko: 클로뎃이에요 꼭 해야 할 말이 있어요!

translation.en: Okay, one second.
Let's get you in the closet.
[Nick] Okay, be right there. I gotta get some cheese.
-Okay. Just go in there. -[rock scraping floor]
No! Get off of… Jesus!
-Coming, Claudette! -Sorry! One second.
[Nick] Hurry!
-[Audrey] Hello, Claudette. -[Nick] Hi.
[Claudette] They all think I'm marrying Vik
translation.ko: 다들 내가 돈 때문에 비크랑 결혼한 줄 알아요

translation.en: just for the money, especially the Countess.
translation.ko: 다들 내가 돈 때문에 비크랑 결혼한 줄 알아요 특히 백작이요

translation.en: She's been jealous of me ever since we met.
translation.ko: 걘 처음 만났을 때부터 날 질투했어요

translation.en: -Really? I can imagine why. -I can imagine.
But still, she was my best friend.
-Right. -[Nick] Sure.
-You know? -Yeah.
-We were so close. -[Audrey] Oh!
And I think I just miss her sometimes.
-Oh, sorry. -[Claudette sobbing]
-I just wanna know who kidnapped my Vik. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 난 누가 비크를 납치했는지 알고 싶을 뿐이에요

translation.en: They all have something to gain from this.
translation.ko: 다들 이 일로 얻는 게 있어요

translation.en: -Terrible. -[Claudette] I can't trust any of them!
-[whispers] There's a gun. -A gun?
[Claudette] The Colonel, so bitter about his demotion.
translation.ko: 대령님은 뭄바이 사건 이후로 강등된 데 불만이 있었고

translation.en: Saira, always starved for attention.
And Vik had just discovered
Francisco's dark secret.
-[Audrey] What? -[Nick] He had a secret?
-Oh! -[Nick] Oh God.
-[Audrey] We don't need to do that. -[Nick] That's cool.
Who is it?
It's Saira. Let me in.
Uh, okay. One second.
-I need to hide. The closet! -No, no, no!
-[Nick] It's too dark. -Here. Come on.
-[Nick] She has all her stuff. -One second, Saira!
translation.ko: - 아내 옷으로 꽉 차 있고요 - 잠깐만요, 사이라!

translation.en: [Nick] Coming! Be right there!
Okay, gotta get to you!
-So sorry. One second. -Moving around some stuff for fun!
translation.ko: - 미안해요, 잠깐만요 - 물건 옮기기 놀이를 하느라요!

translation.en: -I know who you need to be looking at. -[Nick] Who?
-Claudette! -[Nick] Claudette?
[Saira] I told Vik she was bad news the minute I met her.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 문제를 일으킬 거라고 오빠한테 얘기했었죠

translation.en: She's suspicious, narcissistic, manipulative,
and looks cheap as well in that red dress--
Excuse me! I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I feel like I'd be a rude hostess
translation.ko: 말 끊어서 미안하지만 그래도 손님이 왔는데

translation.en: if I didn't offer you a piece of this exquisite artisan cheese that's…
translation.ko: 이 고급 치즈라도 대접을 해야 할 것…

translation.en: Nick, where's this… Where's that cheese? The big--
translation.ko: 닉, 치즈 어디 있어? 그 큼직한…

translation.en: -The cheese is gone. -Where is it?
I put it, uh, in my stomach.
You ate that entire block of cheese?
Trying to shame me. I don't know if that's gonna get the cheese back--
translation.ko: 날 쪽팔리게 한다고 치즈가 돌아올지는 모르겠지만…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be selfish--
Sorry. Hold on. You know what?
Let me give you a drink right now just to relax you a little bit.
translation.ko: 술이라도 한 잔 줄게요 마음 좀 가라앉혀요

translation.en: -Here. -I… I don't want that.
-No? Okay. -I'm okay.
-Oh shit. -[Saira] Who is it?
-[Audrey] Not sure. -You expecting someone?
It's like an after-party. People just show up.
Let's put you into the bedroom, just in case, 'cause I don't know.
-I'll hide there. -Don't hide in there! Why?
translation.ko: - 여기 숨을게요 - 안 돼요! 저긴 너무 뻔하잖아요

translation.en: That's an obvious spot.
-[Audrey] Is it hot in here? -I'm hot too.
translation.ko: - 여기 덥지 않아? - 나도 더워 - 저기 숨어요 - 내가 열게, 가요!

translation.en: -I'm coming! -[knocking continues]
What if that is the killer?
Don't you kinda want it to be the killer so they can kill us?
translation.ko: 차라리 살인범이 나타나서 우릴 죽이는 게 낫지 않아?

translation.en: I am sick of this shit.
-Baby, I do not feel very good. -[rock scraping]
What's doin'? Yeah?
Hey, great to see you.
What's going on? [chuckles lightly]
[Countess] I know who did it.
Who?
It was Francisco.
Francisco!
He has had over 85 paternity suits filed against him.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 85건이 넘는 친자 확인 소송을 당했어요

translation.en: We suspect he's been siphoning money out of the company
in order to pay for all of these babies he made.
translation.ko: 자기 애들 양육비를 댄다고 의심하고 있죠

translation.en: That's a lie!
Not the part about the babies.
Yes, that's true. I've spread my seed far and wide,
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 내 씨를 널리 퍼뜨리고 다녔지

translation.en: but I have never stolen in my life.

translation.en: -Nobody move! -Oh my God!
I ain't moving.
It's mine. It's mine.
-I missed it. -[Nick] Missed the call?
I have a message.
[distorted voice] We have the Maharajah.
If you contact the authorities, he dies.
We'll make our demands known to you at 7:00 a.m.
That voice is hysterical. You got to admit it.
So we should all stay here. Correct, Colonel?
Because one of us is definitely working with the kidnapper.

translation.en: Yeah. Motives, opportunities.
Somebody here.
My head is spinning a little bit.
Honey?
Babe, are you taking a nap? I'm tired, too, so let's, uh…

translation.en: [yelps] Jesus! What?
Oh my God. Nick?
-[Nick] Yeah. -Nick?
[Nick] Yeah?
-[Audrey] Nick! -Uh-huh.
Nicky, honey. Get up. Get up! We got roofied.

translation.en: -[Nick] Oh yeah? -Honey! [Nick] We're sleeping now.

translation.en: I don't know what happened. Uh, I…
-Come on! Get up, Nick! -[Nick] Okay. Up. I'm up.
[Audrey] Who did this?
[Nick] What? Now they're just showing off.
-[Audrey] Hurry up! -[Nick] Okay, I'm coming, honey. So…
-[Audrey] Get up! -[Nick] I'm up!
-Calm down before you say anything. -Nobody drugs us and gets away with it!
translation.ko: - 일단 진정하고 얘기해 - 감히 우리한테 약을 먹여?

translation.en: -Maybe they didn't drug us. -It's illegal!
translation.ko: - 아닐 수도 있어 - 이건 미친 짓이고 불법이야!

translation.en: Maybe we just ate too much.
-That's why we passed out. -Nick. Audrey. Just in time.
translation.ko: 우리가 과식해서 쓰러진 걸지도 몰라 닉, 오드리, 제때 왔군

translation.en: -For what? -For what?
The real detectives have just arrived.
[Colonel] Connor Miller.
-[Audrey gasps] -Former MI6 hostage negotiator.
Oh my God. Specializes in high-profile cases.
He got the President of Uruguay's son back from the cartel.
translation.ko: 우루과이 대통령의 아들을 카르텔에서 되찾기도 했어

translation.en: -He wrote the book. He wrote the book. -On what?
How Rogaine doesn't work for everybody?

translation.en: The book! Our course detective book!
[Miller] Greetings. I hear you need a case solved.
Colonel. Been a long time.
Francisco Perez.
Big fan.
-Oh. -Hey.
Mr. Miller, we're also very big fans. Um, we can bring you up to speed.

translation.en: leaving the second guy still on the island.
Also, just so you know, we were both drugged last night.
translation.ko: 그리고 어젯밤에 누군가 저희에게 약을 먹였어요

translation.en: I don't know if we were drugged. We did have a few drinks--
translation.ko: 그건 모르겠어요 술도 몇 잔 마셨고…

translation.en: -You must be the Spitzes. -Yes.
Yes, we are!
Your reputations precede you.
-There you go. -Why, thank you.
-That's nice to hear. -Uh, not in a positive way, I'm afraid.
Okay.
I understand the last time you were involved in something like this,
everybody died?
Well, that was not the Maharajah.
How's he doing now?
-[laughs] Okay. -Right.
The Colonel's still here, most of him, so there. That's good.

[Miller] Colonel, I wanna see all the security footage.

translation.en: All the footage was wiped from the mainframe.
Yeah, 'cause it's an inside job.
Mademoiselle Joubert, we'll need your phone for a vocal analysis of the voice mail.

translation.en: Of course. Anything you need.
translation.ko: - 필요한 건 뭐든 드릴게요 - 놈들은 분명 전문가예요

translation.en: They're professional, no doubt. They were concise and brief on the phone.
translation.ko: - 필요한 건 뭐든 드릴게요 - 놈들은 분명 전문가예요 통화할 때도 간단명료했죠

translation.en: We also have reason to believe
that the inside man was posing as an elephant handler.
translation.ko: 그 내부자가 코끼리 조련사로 위장했다고 생각해요

translation.en: You really wanna do suspects now, Mrs. Spitz?
translation.ko: 지금 용의자 조사를 해볼까요 스피츠 부인?

translation.en: -Sure. -[Miller] Fine.
How about this? Uh…
A husband and wife, one an NYPD almost-detective,
translation.ko: 부부 중 한 명은 NYPD에서 형사를 꿈꿨고

translation.en: the other a hairdresser taking online classes.
translation.ko: 한 명은 온라인 수업을 듣는 미용사로

translation.en: Together they run a private detective agency teetering on the edge of bankruptcy.
translation.ko: 둘은 파산 위기에 처한 탐정 사무소를 운영 중이죠

translation.ko: 추측하자면 아마 결혼 생활에 타격을 입었을 겁니다

translation.en: Desperate to give validity to their failing business,
translation.ko: 그러다 망해 가는 사업을 되살리려던 둘은

translation.en: they accept a last-minute invite from a billionaire to attend his wedding.
translation.ko: 억만장자의 막판 결혼식 초대에 응하게 되죠

translation.en: And so a plan is born.
Twenty-four hours after their arrival, there's a high-profile kidnapping,
translation.ko: 두 사람이 도착하고 24시간 후 유명인이 납치되는 주목받는 사건이 발생하고

translation.en: the sort that gets attention.
A career maker.
How's my reasoning, fellow… detectives?
-Pretty excellent. None of it was true. -Gorgeous.
translation.ko: - 훌륭해요 - 대단해요 사실은 아니지만 말발 때문에 수긍하고 있었다니까요

translation.en: I was starting to go with it 'cause of the way you phrase things.
translation.ko: 사실은 아니지만 말발 때문에 수긍하고 있었다니까요

translation.en: -I almost believed him. -The accent helps.
Call trace is ready. Kidnappers should be calling in any minute.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I have a job to do.
-Okay, so listen. -[Audrey] Yes, honey.
We got good cheese. We got free iPhones. I'm happy with everything.

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah. -None of that's true!
We need to show those people what Nick and Audrey Spitz are all about.

-Nick. Audrey. -[both] What?
The kidnapper says he'll only talk to the man he shot at.

translation.en: They need us. All right. They need us.
-Let's go! -Let's go!
-[machines beeping] -[Colonel] They're here.
-[Miller] He's calling back in a minute. -Okay.

translation.en: You need to keep him calm, keep him talking.
-We need at least-- -Forty-five seconds.
-I know. It's not my first rodeo, pal. -You've done hostage negotiation?
translation.ko: - 알아요, 처음도 아니고요 - 인질 협상 해 봤어요?

translation.en: I'm married to this lady. Everything's a negotiation. I got it.
translation.ko: 난 이 여자랑 결혼했고 만사가 협상이에요 걱정 마요, 고마워요

translation.en: Appreciate it.
So 45 seconds, and it starts… now.
Hi. Kidnapper, how are you?
[kidnapper] Is this the man who tried to stop me on my escape?

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, the man you shot at.

translation.en: Luckily, I got out of the way. [chuckles]
Tell me what we can do to get Vik back safely. That's all we really care about.

Fifty putos millones?
Francisco, you think this is The Price Is Right, screaming out numbers?

translation.en: Way too much money for just one guy.

translation.en: There's the "taking-a-toll-on-the-marriage" thing.
Excuse me! At least we are married.
Yeah. Calm down. This is how we communicate. We're from New York.

translation.en: Can we remain calm?
-I'm sorry. Of course. -We're calm.
He wants the money. He's gonna call back.
-[Audrey] Relax. -[Nick] Yup.
-[phone ringing] -[Nick] Here we go. Okay.
-[Miller] Here we go. -Got this!
Forty-five seconds starts again now.
Sorry about that, man. A lot of anxious people here.

translation.en: One drunk guy. We all got that friend.

translation.en: [kidnapper] The price just went up to 60.
They say, "Great. No problem."
[kidnapper] You will bring $60 million in untraceable bearer bonds

translation.en: to the Arc de Triomphe in Paris at 8:00 p.m. tomorrow night

But we are going to need unequivocal evidence that the hostage is still alive.

[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe, 8:00 p.m., or the Maharajah dies.

translation.en: The voice jumbling thing you got on your… It's hard to understand you.

translation.en: -[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe. -[Nick] This is what you sound like…
-[Nick] That's what we hear. -[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe!
Okay, so Arctic Tree Hump.
Got it. You said that, right? [kidnapper] The price just went up to 70 now!

translation.en: Muhammad Ali dies, you say?
-[kidnapper] Oh my God! -[disconnects]
You just cost us 20 extra million, you doofus!

translation.en: I don't want these buffoons involved.

translation.en: I'm afraid the kidnapper does, so we're stuck with them.

translation.en: They did it. Got the trace.
-We did? -Aha!
-See? Team Buffoon wins again! -Thank you!
translation.ko: - 봤지? 얼간이 부부가 또 해냈어 - 고마워!

translation.en: You can go back in the ocean now, Miller. We got this.
translation.ko: 이제 바다로 돌아가요, 밀러 이건 우리가 맡죠

translation.en: Wow!
[Nick] Let's go and do some sightseeing after the ransom paying.

Can we just… You know what? After we get Vik back,
we could go and renew our vows at Love Locks Bridge.
It's a date.
I'm gonna need your phones.
-Need our phones? -Why?
-[Miller] They're compromised. -Oh, okay.
We'll get 'em back, right? These are brand-new. We got 'em for free.
translation.ko: 돌려주는 거죠? 신상이거든요 공짜로 받았어요, 답례품으로요

translation.en: In the gift bags. They gave 'em to us--
translation.ko: 공짜로 받았어요, 답례품으로요 비크가 준 건데…

translation.en: -Can't believe that happened. -We're not getting them back.
translation.ko: 믿을 수가 없군 - 되찾긴 글렀네 - 내 거시기 사진도 날아갔어

translation.en: I had a dick pic on mine, but that's gone.

The only important phone is the one the kidnapper will call on. Here.

translation.en: -Mr. Spitz, can you handle a gun? -[Nick] Yes.
translation.ko: - 스피츠 씨, 총 다룰 수 있어요? - 네

translation.en: -I told you, I was on the force. What? -Um…
[hesitates] I just think maybe I should handle it.
-You should handle it? -Just--
-Why would that-- -Your aim is--
My aim? My aim is fine. -Why are you saying this? -He can't hear--
translation.ko: 내 명중률 괜찮아 왜 저 사람 앞에서 그 얘길 해?

translation.en: That's like me saying you wear Spanx in front of a supermodel.
translation.ko: 못 들어 당신 거들 입는다고 슈퍼 모델 앞에서 말하면 좋겠어?

translation.en: So, uh, I'll take the gun 'cause I'm very good with a gun.
translation.ko: 총은 내가 찰게요 난 총을 잘 다루니까요

translation.en: They used to call me "Nicky Guns" on the force. That was my nickname.
translation.ko: 경찰에 있을 때 내 별명이 '총잡이 니키'였고

translation.en: Gang members used to ask me for advice on the weekends 'cause I shot so well.
translation.ko: 갱 단원들도 주말마다 찾아와 총 잘 쏘는 법을 가르쳐 달랬죠

translation.en: I'd say, "I can't. I don't wanna help you guys."
You take the gun.
I'll take the gun. I got the phone, and you got the money.

translation.en: When they call, I want you to follow the three rules of ransom drops
translation.ko: 전화가 오면 몸값 전달의 3가지 규칙을 따르도록 해요

translation.en: from Chapter 12 of my book.
Can you do that? Remember what they are?
Number one. Um, follow all reasonable instructions.
-Yes. -[Audrey] Number two.
Do not hand off the ransom until you see the kidnappee.

translation.en: [Miller] Exactly.
And number three. Do not go to a secondary location with them.
translation.ko: - 맞아요 - 3번은 범인들과 함께 다른 장소로 가지 않는다

translation.en: Perfect. You'll be fine.
Off you go.
-Okay. -"Nicky Guns" style. Let's go!
-Cool. -I'm gonna hand you this.
You gotta tell me who on earth ever called you "Nicky Guns."
translation.ko: 누가 당신을 총잡이 니키라고 불렀는지 대 봐

translation.en: You gotta tell me who didn't call me that. Everybody called me that.
translation.ko: 그렇게 안 부른 사람을 대 봐 다들 그렇게 불렀어

translation.en: This is the heaviest goddamn case of money I've ever felt.
Why couldn't they Venmo? This thing weighs…
translation.ko: 왜 송금을 안 하고 이 무거운 걸…

translation.en: My hands are killing me.
I'm gonna go two hands. Does that look weird?
-[Audrey] Your hands are cute. -[Nick] "Cute"? What does that mean?
translation.ko: - 당신 손이 귀엽긴 하지 - 무슨 뜻이야?

translation.en: -You have cute hands. -Your family has orangutan ha--
You grew up thinking giant hands are normal.
translation.ko: 그 커다란 손이 평범한 건 줄 알았겠지

translation.en: [Audrey] I never said dainty hands.
I said it's weird to high-five you 'cause your hands are little.
translation.ko: 당신 손이 작아서 하이파이브 하기 이상하다고 했지

translation.en: [Nick] They're average hands.
-Your grandmother can palm a bulldog. -[Audrey] Oh, please.
translation.ko: 당신 할머니는 손바닥에 불도그도 올리잖아 - 그만해 - 누굴 찾아야 하지?

translation.en: Shit, shit, shit. That's the phone.
Okay, here we go.
Initiate the trace.
Hi. Bonjour, uh, madame or mademoiselle or monsieur. Go ahead.
translation.ko: 여보세요, 봉주르, 마담 마드무아젤, 무슈? 말해요

translation.en: [Vik] Nick, it's me!
[Nick] Rajah! You okay?
So we got the money, and we just need to know where to bring it.

translation.en: It was henna.
And it was your henna that never had time to dry the night of the murder.
translation.ko: 살인이 일어난 날 밤에 말릴 시간이 없던 당신의 헤나요

translation.en: Oh my God! The sister did it!
Oh snap!
Come on. This is lunacy! You guys, haven't we done this already?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼요 아까 얘기 끝나지 않았어요?

translation.en: I love my brother. I mean, what reason would I have to--
translation.ko: 난 오빠를 사랑해요 내가 뭐 때문에 그런…

translation.en: Maybe because your parents gave him the family business,
even though you're the smart one,
and he's the Jet Skiing rapper wannabe with no skill at all?
translation.ko: 비크는 재능이라곤 없는 제트 스키 래퍼 꿈나무인데도요

translation.en: No offense.
Some taken.
And isn't that the same reason you tried to kill him in Mumbai?
translation.ko: 그래서 뭄바이에서도 비크를 죽이려 하지 않았나요?

translation.en: You!
Well, my parents were right about one thing.
If you need something done correctly,
you should just do it yourself.
-[Vik] Saira! -[Audrey gasps]
[Colonel] No!
Oh! This poor guy, honey! He's running out of arms!
Not in my town.
Yeah! That's my bae!
[sighs] Thank you, baby. I've got to just…
-'Sup! It's okay. Yeah. -[Colonel groans]
You… You did great, pal. You're my number one bodyguard.
And not just 'cause the last one got smoked.
That Kwanzaa bonus better be off the hook this year.
Hey, it's bionic arm time, bitch! Yeah?
translation.ko: 생체 공학 팔을 드려야죠 안 그래요?

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah!
[Susan] You're okay.
-How are you feeling, young man? -How are you doing?
-I'm okay. -Laurent is a special man. Aren't you?
We're gonna go to dinner once you get out of the hospital.
Paris weaves its spell once again.
translation.ko: 파리가 또 한 번 마법을 부리네요

translation.en: Feel better.
-All right. -[Vik] Should we tell them?
-Yes! [laughs] -Okay, guys. We decided to elope.
translation.ko: 말할까? 하자 우린 멀리 달아나기로 했어요

translation.en: -That is the smart choice, always. -That's amazing.
Good for you guys.
Yeah, no family, but, um,
translation.ko: 그래, 가족이 없는 곳으로 어쨌든 두 사람은 내 생명의 은인이야

translation.en: I owe you guys my life.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 두 사람은 내 생명의 은인이야

translation.en: Oh, we're just happy you're both okay.
translation.ko: 우린 두 사람이 무사한 걸로 족해

translation.en: And really, honestly, thank you for giving us an adventure…
translation.ko: 이런 모험을 하게 해 줘서 정말 고마워요

translation.en: Yes.
…we are never going to forget.
-I guess we're even then. Peace out. -Peace out!
translation.ko: - 네 - 그럼 공평한 것 같네, 우린 이만 우린 이만!

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Au revoir!
Sorry about your sister being a psycho, by the way.
Ah, don't worry about it. She's a real piece of shit.
-Yes, she was. -[both] Yeah.
-[Nick] Okay. -Honey, I'm really ready to go home.
translation.ko: - 알겠어 - 나 정말 집에 가고 싶어

translation.en: -Yes, I am too. -I'm really ready.
We have to do one thing first.
translation.ko: 그 전에 할 일이 하나 있어

translation.en: -Trust me. Trust me. All right? -What? Okay. Okay. Okay.
-[Nick] Check on the Colonel. You okay? -[Audrey] Colonel!
translation.ko: - 대령님 확인하고 가자 - 그래 - 괜찮으세요? - 대령님!

translation.en: You're not losing this arm?
[Nick] Click it. Click it. We did it.
Now we are forever locked up together for the rest of our lives.
translation.ko: 이제 우린 평생 함께 묶인 거야

translation.en: I'd never wanna be locked up with anybody else.
translation.ko: 난 다른 사람이랑 묶일 생각 없어

translation.en: Me neither, sweetheart. You are--
-[man] The Shitz! -What?
[chuckles] Nick and Audrey Shitz!
-The helicopter guy? What the-- -What are you doing here?
translation.ko: - 그 헬기 조종사? 어떻게… - 여긴 웬일이에요?

translation.en: Take it. Take the phone!
Hello?
[Vik] Of course we're not even. Take my helicopter!
Go anywhere! Have a honeymoon you deserve! And a little cash!
translation.ko: 어디든 가서 신혼여행을 즐기라고! 현금도 조금 준비했어!

translation.en: -What? -Cash? A bag of--
-Are you for real? -[Nick laughs]
-Oh my gosh. Look! Oh my-- -Well, yeah.
translation.ko: 세상에! 이거 엄청 넉넉하게 들었네 고마워

translation.en: That seems to be enough money. Thank you.
[Vik] Just ten million! Don't spend it all in one place!
translation.ko: 천만 달러밖에 안 돼 한곳에서 다 쓰지 마!

translation.en: But if you do spend it all, just sell the briefcase.
translation.ko: 혹시라도 다 쓰면 그 가방을 팔면 돼

translation.en: It's worth three million!
-It's dinosaur leather! -My God!
Dinosaur? We can't take this! Come on!
You know what? We will take this. Thank you.
[Vik] Now you two keep busting nuts! Maharajah out!
translation.ko: 이제 둘이 신나게 놀아! 마하라자 통신 끝!

translation.en: What's the first thing you wanna do?
-I wanna kiss you! -Ah!
I can't believe this!
-My baby. -My darling.
The honeymoon we always deserved.
-Exactly. -Finally.
Can you believe how lucky we are?
[American accent] You liking those drinks?
-What-- -Are you shitz-ing us right now?
Hand me the bag.
What? The, uh--
-Bag. Hand me the bag. -You want this?
-That's not a problem. -Give him the bag.
[Nick] What happened to the accent?
It's back in Jersey.
Let's just have a civilized conversation.
[pilot] See you never, Shitzes!
-Oh my God! Where did he-- -Oh my God! Oh-- Oh my--
